flawed_nl_solution:
There were 1150-150=<<1150-150=1000>>1000 people who didn't vote for John
That means James got 1000*0.7=<<1000*0.7=70>>70 votes
So the other candidate got 1000-70=<<1000-70=930>>930 votes
This means he got 930-150=<<930-150=780>>780 more votes than John.
#### 780

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 700, not 70. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
